short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove videos from the homepage and place an inspirational quote

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever noticed that you spend too much time on YouTube? 
This add-on block the access to YouTube homepage. It will not block the access of videos throw external links.
